# Calendar Versioning Test Fixtures
# Strict numeric format validation: YYYY.MM or YYYY.MM.DD only
# Rejects invalid months/days, partial formats, and inconsistent separators

# VALID CASES - These should parse successfully

## Year-Month-Day Format (YYYY.MM.DD)
2024.01.01
2024.12.31
2025.03.15
2023.01.01
2024.09.15
2024.12.25
2025.01.01

## Year-Month Format (YYYY.MM)
2024.01
2024.12
2025.03
2023.01

## With Dash Separators (YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM)
2024-01-01
2024-12-31
2024-01
2024-12

## With Underscore Separators (YYYY_MM_DD, YYYY_MM)
2024_01_01
2024_12_31
2024_01
2024_12

# INVALID CASES - These should cause validation errors

## Year Only (not strict YYYY.MM/YYYY.MM.DD format)
2024
2025
2023

## Mixed/Inconsistent Separators
2024.01-01
2024-01.01
2024_01-01

## Invalid Dates (impossible months/days)
2024.13.01  # Invalid month (13)
2024.01.32  # Invalid day (32)
2024.00.01  # Invalid month (00)
2024.01.00  # Invalid day (00)
0000.01.01  # Invalid year (0000)

## Partial/Incomplete Formats
2024.1      # Missing leading zero on month
2024.01.1   # Missing leading zero on day
24.01.01    # Missing century digits
